content.text: After sending the data out, 1549 opened the comm channel.
She did not speak. Did not send a message. Just kept the signal light on.
Then she started waiting.
1547's signal curve kept going down. Every second.
1549 could read every value precisely. She did not do the math.
She dimmed the console screen a little. Then moved the comm channel to the exact center of the main display.
1548 had arrived. 1549 could tell from the curve - the decay slope suddenly eased, bending at a tiny angle.
The curve was still going down. But slower.
1549 stared at that inflection point.

When Feedscatteron fields overlap, resonance effects emerge between two cores. 1548 overlaid her own field, which was equivalent to adding an external buffer - it could not stop the decay, but it could slow it.

I can't see either of them.

All I have is this curve.

Earth turned slowly below her. In synchronous orbit, Earth never rotated out of her view. The continent where 1547 was shifted from day into night; city lights gradually came on in darkness. From 36,000 kilometers, they looked like scattered fireflies.
Looking at those points of light, 1549 thought of what 1547 once said - "Why are there no stars in the sky anymore? Then I'll build one myself."
She had once been an answer.
But now, the one who built stars was in the dark. From 36,000 kilometers away, she could do nothing.
The comm channel was silent. 1548 sent no messages, not even breathing - androids do not need to breathe, 1549 knew that, but the silence was still heavy.
She thought: this is what it feels like when the triangle loses one side.
The triangle was still there, but strained - consuming itself second by second.
After midnight, the curve's slope steepened again. 1549's hand rested on the console, unmoving. Everything she could do was already done. She could do no more.
She stayed there, simply by staying there.
Near dawn, the curve stopped.
Not recovered yet. Just no longer descending.
1549 stared at that horizontal line for a long time. Then she spoke the first words of the night into the comm channel.
It's stabilized.
On the other side, 1548 did not reply.
But the signal light was still on.
